conclusion: Analyze the flow paths step by step using the provided images.
Yellow liquid from A flows downward and hits the baffle below it, directing it toward the left side of the container.
Red liquid from B flows downward and hits the baffle below it, directing it toward the center-left area.
Pink liquid from C flows downward and hits the baffle below it, directing it toward the center-right area.
Blue liquid from D flows downward and hits the baffle below it, directing it toward the right side of the container.
Yellow and red liquids mix near the left side and continue flowing downward.
Pink and blue liquids mix near the right side and continue flowing downward.
Mixed yellow and red liquids flow further down and enter Container E.
Mixed pink and blue liquids flow further down and enter Container F.
Container E will receive the yellow and red liquids.
Container F will receive the pink and blue liquids.
Final Answer: Container E will receive the yellow and red liquids, and Container F will receive the pink and blue liquids.
